name: Moon Landing VR
description: Ever want to casually explore our solar system from the comfort of your own home? Now you can in Moon Landing VR - Have Fun While Learning!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
